column5: The time has come people 10 years or older dui/dwi conviction dates will be abolished in border crossing events! That means canadian guy you better stock up on your labatt crystal because i am buying canada out of that brand.......lol. Have a nice day!

Well, it probably makes sense....but now how the he11 are we gonna pass the time on this board come next winter? ;)derrek."I'll teach these eyes to see,beyond these walls in front of me"- Bruce Springsteen, "Trapped"
Glad to hear it ......The law was a bit too strict as it stood. May the Walleye Gods be with you.
Well...ya know what eh....there is always that mayonaise thing to gripe aboat Eh!Vinager or mayo please?;)Backwater Eddy...><sUMo>
Speaking of winter discussion I wonder if Phidelt 157 and his crew of DUIs made it across......Maybe he can fill us in on the adventure and how the fishing was........

I met two Americans in the bush here fishing and we had a drink or two together and the one was continually boasting of his travel to foreign countries. He had been to almost every country in the world and most planets within two light years. Even his partner was getting uncomfortable with his ongoing rhetoric. I had been on holiday to Cuba a year back and enjoyed the visit and asked him if he had enjoyed his stay there as he had been everywhere.......The talk quickly shifted to fishing and the poor performance of the S+P 500.

That might explain the good deals I got at the Federal Impound auction I went to last week here in the Sault. Lund boat and some tackle and even a portable Aerator.All for $2500 Canadian ( thats $500 american) Was it Phidelt 157's stuff ??:) :)(just kidding !)jake

Does that mean friday is the first day or saturday that you can not worry about the old dwi's? Does canada sell the good class c fireworks as we will be on the island on the 4th of july? p.s. Is it still raining up there?
hey wawajakeany web site for the auctions???
